meanings.sent1: The cruel enslaver captured innocent people and forced them to work.
meanings.sent2: The enslaver was known for his ruthless treatment of his slaves.
meanings.sent3: The enslaver thought he could control everyone, but he couldn't even control his own dog.
meanings.sent4: The enslaver's grip on power was like a heavy chain, binding all those around him.
meanings.sent5: The image of the enslaver standing over his captives is a haunting one.

meanings.sent1: He tried to enslave the villagers, but they fought back bravely.
meanings.sent2: The evil sorcerer used dark magic to enslave the princess.
meanings.sent3: The hypnotist joked that he could enslave minds with just a snap of his fingers.
meanings.sent4: The addiction seemed to enslave him, trapping him in a cycle of destructive behavior.
meanings.sent5: The powerful artifact had the ability to enslave anyone who touched it.
